Title: A Healthy Task
Text: A Monk has tasked you to collect some rare heart crystals he's heard tales of. He seemed to think he might be able to make something of value from it...
CompleteText: Hmmm, yes, yes! I think this crystal is overflowing with life energy. I should be able to fashion an enchanted vessel from these which should imbue you with improved vitality. In fact, yes, that wasn't so hard, here's what I hope will be the first of many. I'll let you have this one for free. If you find any more of that crystal, bring it to me, and I can turn it into more of these Heart Containers, but I'm not giving out any more freebies, you'll have to pay for the labour.
